body: 看错误信息是没有把分库分表rule配置正确，在sql中既没找到分片需要的表，也没有default datasource，和是不是oracle视图没关系
分片算法是自己定义的，根据什么分片上下文，返回哪个表名，都取决于分片算法
批量插入提示错误Caused by: java.sql.SQLException: Parameter index out of range (1 > number of parameters, which is 0).

### SQL: INSERT INTO test(ids,version) VALUES          (?, ?)    ,     (?, ?)    ;
### Cause: io.shardingjdbc.core.exception.ShardingJdbcException: Invoke jdbc method exception
duplicate with #290

1. OR路由并不简单，与and和各种括号中优先级，并不是全路由就能解决的。需要拆为旋转树解析才可以
2. 冗余括号是同理，需要解析为抽象语法树。目前不解析冗余括号，整个解析上下文是平层的。加上括号，and和or，需要AST。具体理论请看编译原理会好一些
实例创建销毁很频繁，一个YGC也能解决。请问是否真的产生FGC，影响业务了？脱离上下文的数据并没有意义。请提供运行了多久，进行了几次FGC，几次YGC，每次间隔多少，内存的使用情况等综合指标。
同样不支持
请提供数据库表结构，分片策略配置以及sql.show的相关日志

目前不支持

### 分片策略

```
sharding:
  jdbc:
    datasource:
      names: ds
      ds:
        type: org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.DataSource
        url: jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1:3306/imtest?autoReconnect=true&useSSL=false&useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=UTF-8
        username: root
        password: xxxx
        driverClassName: com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver

    config:
      sharding:
        tables:
          Card:
            actualDataNodes: ds.Card_${0..2}
            tableStrategy:
              standard:
                shardingColumn: toUser
                preciseAlgorithmClassName: com.talbrain.platform.datasource.sharding.algorithm.CardPreciseShardingAlgorithm
        props:
          sql.show: true
```

### 分片策略代码

```
public class CardPreciseShardingAlgorithm implements PreciseShardingAlgorithm<String> {
    private static final int TABLE_SIZE = 3;
    @Override
    public String doSharding(Collection<String> availableTargetNames, PreciseShardingValue<String> shardingValue) {
        String value = shardingValue.getValue();
        int hashCode = Math.floorMod(value.hashCode(), TABLE_SIZE);
        for (String each : availableTargetNames) {
            if (each.endsWith(String.valueOf(hashCode))) {
                return each;
            }
        }
        throw new RuntimeException("doSharding | Failed to sharding for value: {}");
    }
}

```

没有设置分片键，所以全库+全表更新，这个是没问题的。
如果想更新单表，需要在where条件中加上toUser这个分片键才可以。
请先阅读文档

测试用例：DataSourceJsonConverterTest.createDataSource(final String dataSourceName) 中请使用接口javax.sql.DataSource, 实现类请使用阿里的com.alibaba.druid.pool.DruidDataSource,如下：

> DataSource result = new com.alibaba.druid.pool.DruidDataSource();

方能验证该问题。
非常感谢官方如此迅速的答复
作者改变原来的key，即由name->shardingJdbcDataSourceName; clazz->shardingJdbcDataSourceClazz

哦，明白了。这个是配置了BindingTableRule导致。BindingTable的意思是两组表的分片规则必须完全一致才可以。
你的示例中所表达的意思，是两组表的分片规则不一致，因此就不应该配置BindingTableRule。删除BindingTableRule应该就可以了，但是查询效率较低，会采取笛卡尔积查询
@terrymanu 其实就算是A表和B表都分为同样数量的两个表，这种情况不会异常，但两者策略不一样，为什么还是会有A_0对应B_a，A_1对应B_b的匹配关系呢，强调是两者分表策略不一样的

两组分片规则不同的表，不应该配置BindingTableRule

at io.shardingjdbc.core.rule.BindingTableRule.getBindingActualTable(BindingTableRule.java:76)

<sharding-jdbc-core.version>2.0.1</sharding-jdbc-core.version>
@Component
public class UserTableRule extends TableRuleSharding {

	@Value(value="${environment.server.id}")
	private long workerId = 1;
	
	public UserTableRule() {
		super();
		DefaultKeyGenerator.setWorkerId(workerId);
		this.setLogicTable("user");
		this.setActualDataNodes("db1.user_${0..30}");
		// DefaultKeyGenerator.setWorkerId(workerId);
		// 选库规则
		// this.setDatabaseShardingStrategyConfig(new InlineShardingStrategyConfiguration("master_id", "db_${master_id % 2}");
		// 选表规则
		this.setTableShardingStrategyConfig(new ComplexShardingStrategyConfiguration("account", UserTableShardingAlgorithm.class.getName()));
		this.setKeyGeneratorColumnName("user_id");
		this.setKeyGeneratorClass(DefaultKeyGenerator.class.getName());
	}
	
	public static class UserTableShardingAlgorithm implements ComplexKeysShardingAlgorithm {

		@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
		@Override
		public Collection<String> doSharding(Collection<String> availableTargetNames, Collection<ShardingValue> shardingValues) {
			List<Integer> indexs = new ArrayList<Integer>();
			for (ShardingValue shardingValue : shardingValues) {
				if (StringUtils.equals(shardingValue.getColumnName(), "account")) {//账号hash分库
					for (String account : ((ListShardingValue<String>) shardingValue).getValues()) {
						int index = HashAlgorithms.FNVHash1(account) % availableTargetNames.size();
						if(!indexs.contains(index)) {
							indexs.add(index);
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if (indexs.size()<0) {
				return availableTargetNames;
			}
			final List<String> tables = new ArrayList<String>(availableTargetNames);
			List<String> result = new ArrayList<String>();
			indexs.forEach(e->{
				result.add(tables.get(e));
			});
			return result;
		}
	}

}
public class TableRuleSharding extends TableRuleConfiguration {
	
	@Override
	public TableRule build(Map<String, DataSource> dataSourceMap) {
		TableRule tableRule = super.build(dataSourceMap);
		List<String> actualDataNodes = new InlineExpressionParser(this.getActualDataNodes()).evaluate();
		for (String each : actualDataNodes) {
			DataNode dataNode = new DataNode(each);
			DataSource dataSource =  dataSourceMap.get(dataNode.getDataSourceName());
			this.checkTable(dataSource,this.getLogicTable(),dataNode.getTableName());
		}
		return tableRule;
	}
	
	private void checkTable(DataSource dataSource,String logicTable,String shardingTable) {
		if(dataSource instanceof MasterSlaveDataSource) {
			dataSource = ((MasterSlaveDataSource)dataSource).getMasterSlaveRule().getMasterDataSource();
		}
		Connection connection = null;
		Statement statement = null;
		try {
			connection = dataSource.getConnection();
			statement = connection.createStatement();
			String queryTableSql = String.format("select TABLE_NAME from information_schema.tables WHERE TABLE_NAME = '%s'", shardingTable);
			ResultSet resultSet = statement.executeQuery(queryTableSql);
			if(!resultSet.next()) {
				String sql = String.format("create table %s like %s", shardingTable,logicTable);
				statement.execute(sql);
			}
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			throw new IllegalArgumentException("Create Sharding Table Error:"+logicTable, e);
		}finally {
			try {
				if(statement!=null) {
					statement.close();
				}
				if(connection!=null) {
					connection.close();
				}
			} catch (SQLException e) {
				
			}
		}
	}
	
}
public abstract class DBConfig {
	
	private String mapperLocation;
	
	@Resource
	private ApplicationContext applicationContext;
	
	@Resource
	protected Environment env;
	
	protected void setMapperLocation(String mapperLocation) {
		this.mapperLocation = mapperLocation;
	}

	protected String getMapperLocation(){
		if(mapperLocation==null){
			mapperLocation = StringUtils.removeEnd(this.getClass().getResource("").toString(), "configs/")+"**/*.xml";
		}
		return mapperLocation;
	}
	
	protected abstract DataSource dataSource() throws SQLException;
	
	protected DataSource dataSource(JSONObject datas) throws SQLException {
		ShardingRuleConfiguration shardingRuleConfig = new ShardingRuleConfiguration();
		Map<String,DataSource> dataSourceMapAll = new HashMap<String, DataSource>();
		for (String dbName : datas.keySet()) {
			Map<String, DataSource> dataSourceMap = new HashMap<String, DataSource>();
			String masterDataSourceName = null;
			JSONArray dbs = datas.getJSONArray(dbName);
			for (int i = 0; i < dbs.size(); i++) {
				String prefix = dbs.getString(i);
				DataSource dataSource = dataSource(prefix);
				String poolName = dbName+"-"+this.env.getProperty(prefix+".poolName", String.class);
				if(masterDataSourceName==null) {
					masterDataSourceName = poolName;
				}else {
					dataSourceMap.put(poolName, dataSource);
				}
				dataSourceMapAll.put(poolName, dataSource);
			}
			MasterSlaveRuleConfiguration masterSlaveRuleConfig = new MasterSlaveRuleConfiguration();
			masterSlaveRuleConfig.setName(dbName);
			masterSlaveRuleConfig.setMasterDataSourceName(masterDataSourceName);
			if(dataSourceMap.size()>0) {
				for (String dataName : dataSourceMap.keySet()) {
					masterSlaveRuleConfig.getSlaveDataSourceNames().add(dataName);
				}
			}else {//只有一个读写同一个库
				masterSlaveRuleConfig.getSlaveDataSourceNames().add(masterDataSourceName);
			}
			shardingRuleConfig.getMasterSlaveRuleConfigs().add(masterSlaveRuleConfig);
		}
	    Map<String, TableRuleConfiguration> tableRuleMap = this.applicationContext.getBeansOfType(TableRuleConfiguration.class);
	    if(tableRuleMap!=null&&tableRuleMap.size()>0) {
	    	tableRuleMap.forEach((e,v)->{
	    		shardingRuleConfig.getTableRuleConfigs().add(v);
	    		shardingRuleConfig.getBindingTableGroups().add(v.getLogicTable());
	    	});
	    }
	    Properties properties = new Properties();
	    properties.put(ShardingPropertiesConstant.SQL_SHOW.getKey(), env.getProperty("sql.show", Boolean.class, false).toString());
	    return new ShardingDataSource(shardingRuleConfig.build(dataSourceMapAll), new ConcurrentHashMap<String, Object>(), properties);
	}
	
	private DataSource dataSource(String prefix) {
		HikariConfig config = new HikariConfig();
		config.setPoolName(env.getProperty(prefix+".poolName",String.class));
		config.setDriverClassName(env.getProperty(prefix+".driverClassName",String.class));
		config.setJdbcUrl(env.getProperty(prefix+".jdbcUrl",String.class));
		config.setUsername(env.getProperty(prefix+".username",String.class));
		config.setPassword(env.getProperty(prefix+".password",String.class));
		config.setReadOnly(env.getProperty(prefix+".readOnly",Boolean.class));
		config.setConnectionTimeout(env.getProperty(prefix+".connectionTimeout",Long.class));
		config.setIdleTimeout(env.getProperty(prefix+".idleTimeout",Long.class));
		config.setMaxLifetime(env.getProperty(prefix+".maxLifetime",Long.class));
		config.setMaximumPoolSize(env.getProperty(prefix+".maximumPoolSize",Integer.class));
		config.setMinimumIdle(env.getProperty(prefix+".minimumIdle",Integer.class));
		HikariDataSource dataSource = new HikariDataSource(config);
        return dataSource;
    }
	
	protected DataSourceTransactionManager transactionManager(DataSource dataSource) {
        return new DataSourceTransactionManager(dataSource);
    }
	
	protected SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory(DataSource dataSource)
            throws Exception {
        final SqlSessionFactoryBean sessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBean();
        sessionFactory.setDataSource(dataSource);
        sessionFactory.setMapperLocations(new PathMatchingResourcePatternResolver().getResources(getMapperLocation()));
        sessionFactory.setConfiguration(this.getConfiguration());
        PageInterceptor page = new PageInterceptor();
        Properties properties = new Properties();
        properties.setProperty("reasonable", "true");
        properties.setProperty("offsetAsPageNum", "true");
        properties.setProperty("autoRuntimeDialect", "true");
        properties.setProperty("supportMethodsArguments", "true");
        properties.setProperty("rowBoundsWithCount", "false");
        page.setProperties(properties);
        sessionFactory.setPlugins(new Interceptor[]{page});
        return sessionFactory.getObject();
    }
	
	protected Configuration getConfiguration() {
		Configuration config = new Configuration();
		//使全局的映射器启用或禁用缓存
		config.setCacheEnabled(true);
		//全局启用或禁用延迟加载。当禁用时，所有关联对象都会即时加载
		config.setLazyLoadingEnabled(false);
		//配置默认的执行器。SIMPLE 就是普通的执行器；REUSE 执行器会重用预处理语句（prepared statements）； BATCH 执行器将重用语句并执行批量更新。
		config.setDefaultExecutorType(ExecutorType.REUSE);
		return config;
	}
}
